original_text: A country is in terrible trouble if its ruler is young and foolish. If its leaders go to parties all day, a country is in trouble. A country is in terrible trouble if its ruler is young and foolish. If its leaders go to parties all day, a country is in trouble. A country is in terrible trouble if its ruler is young and foolish. If its leaders go to parties all day, a country is in trouble. A country is in terrible trouble if its ruler is young and foolish. If its leaders go to parties all day, a country is in trouble. A country is in terrible trouble
korean_text: 왕은 어리고 대신들은 아침부터 잔치하는 나라여 네게 화가 있도다

sentences.original_text: A country is in terrible trouble
if its ruler is young and foolish
If its leaders go to parties all day
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 지도자들이 종일 파티에 간다면
